description:
B-Project 2 Episode 8 "TRUE THING"
Yashamaru suddenly contacts Tsubasa and says some very troubling things, both for herself and B-PROJECT.
Tsubasa can`t stop thinking about what Yashamaru said about her father and can`t concentrate on her work.
Tsubasa asks the members of B-PROJECT, who seem to know something, about her father and his relationship with Yashamaru, but...
Source: crunchyroll
